overview: The adventures of three friends from their youth, now in their forties, who travel to Valencia to fulfill the last wishes of a fourth friend, who died a year ago. The journey, which seems to be directed from the beyond by the dead, becomes a double adventure: a comic adventure, in which the ashes take all the center stage; and a dramatic adventure, that of the friends' reunion with a former love of their youth, their former gym coach. The reunion will cause a decisive transformation in each of them and will serve to close old wounds and to overcome personal conflicts.
title: 1.000 maneres de menjar-se un ou
